body_html:
On the Power System I faced the same error while installing tensorflow 1.5
Surprisingly, even though the protobuf module was there in the system, python did not pick it up.

After installing google and google-cloud with the following:

pip install google-cloud
pip install google

it worked fine.
body_text:
On the Power System I faced the same error while installing tensorflow 1.5
Surprisingly, even though the protobuf module was there in the system, python did not pick it up.
After installing google and google-cloud with the following:
pip install google-cloud
pip install google

it worked fine.
body:
On the Power System I faced the same error while installing tensorflow 1.5
Surprisingly, even though the protobuf module was there in the system, python did not pick it up.

After installing google and google-cloud with the following:
```
pip install google-cloud
pip install google
```
it worked fine.
